title: Shakespeare’s world and cricket in South Africa
itunes:title: Shakespeare’s world and cricket in South Africa
itunes:subtitle: Edward Wilson-Lee looks at how the playwright’s work became celebrated on a global scale, while Dean Allen recounts the story of a pioneering British cricket enthusiast who popularised the sport in 19th-century South Africa  See acast.com...
description:
Edward Wilson-Lee looks at how the playwright’s work became celebrated on a global scale, while Dean Allen recounts the story of a pioneering British cricket enthusiast who popularised the sport in 19th-century South Africa

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
